name: Spacey Shootey
description:
A simple project created with Godot 3. 

Credits : 

Background music : Eric Skiff - Digital Native - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music

This game's early development is adapted from Ariel Manzur's book, Godot Engine Game Development in 24 Hours, Sams Teach Yourself: The Official Guide to Godot 3.0

Controls :

[SPACE] = shoot

[P] = pause

ARROW KEYS = move
